job_title: Front Desk Receptionist in Lake Havasu City, AZ
pros: stable and dependable co workers you can rely on, management underwent new hiring so not sure what the status of that is yet.
cons: Not long enough lunch breaks, supervisors are hard to reach when calling upon them, very hard work, not for the weak or disabled.

pros: Pay was decent but less than others in the area. Friendly staff.
cons: Still paper charting, the physicians are treated like GOD'S, they can do no wrong,

pros: Not much to mention  Good benefits
cons: No life balance, Always short handed, working  high stress 13-15 hours without eat/drink/pee break burned me out so quick I was left traumatized without desire to work in a hospital ever again😩👎🏽
